amendment.description: To modify the requirements for reports on program to award prizes for advanced technology achievements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1319 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1319 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8543-8544; text: CR S8543-8544) To modify the requirements for reports on program to award prizes for advanced technology achievements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1319 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1319 proposed by Senator Warner.
